name: Dan Williams
text:
Pizza was ok, monkey bread was dough.. won’t order again...

So, I responded to Toppers customer service 5 days ago... not a word. Obviously the responses to any 1 star review they get is simply for show..

name: Jenna Jones
text: Our new favorite pizza place! Sick of chains and looking for something a little different.  Awesome menu, awesome service, awesome food. …More

name: Shannon Densmore-Townsend
text: Lots of options, they always try to make sure you're getting the best deals. My favorite are the topper sticks. You gotta try the chocolate and bacon topper sticks at least once! It's a nice dense pizza when you choose the tall boy crust. Always hits the spot.

name: Michael D. Wulfsohn
text: First time with Toppers. I was using a coupon, which was quite a discount. I was expecting mediocre pizza, but was very surprised when I got it.  It looked great, smelled great, and tasted great! Very generous size pizza for a "medium" (the …More

name: Malk
text: This place was fantastic! Came in at 2 in the morning and the service was fantastic, awesome deals and super cheap. Great for late night munchies

name: Nicole Willemsen
text: We decided to order from toppers after getting there little menu in the mail. The food  looked so good. Well, it cost 32.00 dollars for everything. It was sooooo good, well worth the money.We ordered: pepperoni topper stixs, nacho topper …More

name: M Foster
text: Loved our first experience here. Manager was great, and personable even gave us a free pizza due to mishap with our order. 2nd visit no so great. Walked in and could here a girl in the back vent about having customers and said something …More

name: Tessa Hayes
text: One of the best pizza places, and one of our go to places for dine out nights. We love the pizza, and the 2 for 5.99 each is a great deal when you've got people who don't like the same things. …More

name: Kyle Dana
text: Toppers is awesome. They have an exceptional staff that never fail to make me feel welcome even when I used to drop in at 2 am with my friends. They have since changed their hours but the food is so great, I can't complain. If you're looking for great pizza and cheese sticks in Loveland get toppers.

name: Jeremy Bridges
text: Good pizza. Great prices. More than once, when they made a mistake, they gave me an extra pizza, no charge!

name: Heidi Anderson
text:
I hate to leave poor reviews, but I am so disappointed in the pizza and service we received from Toppers.
We ordered 2 pizzas last night. My boyfriend got food poisoning, and has been …More

name: Max Lopez
text: Every time I go to Toppers I am greeted with a warm welcome and smiling faces. This is the friendliest pizza place I have been to and they always ensure I have everything I need. I like that this location closes so late on weekends. Working …More

name: Ryan Brady
text: Pretty bomb pizza. But I only ordered it because they were open until 3am.  Now they close at 12 like almost every other pizza place. So ill be taking buisness elsewhere.  Definitely a bummer. Would be nice to get some food at 2-3am from somewhere other then my job or Burger King.

name: Shelby Smith
text: Great service and even better pizza. Definitely have to get topper sticks.

name: Ben Stephen
text: Absolutely worst service in loveland, save your money. They hung up on me 13 times and I waited for two hours, still waiting now!

name: Dannie Sauer
text: Surprised to see all the one star reviews or even anything lower than 4. This place makes great food and is very quick about the delivery. I'm always getting cupons or even deals sent to my email or even home address. I'm sorry to hear …More

name: Whitney Dreher
text: Currently on hold with Toppers Pizza in Loveland. After calling seven or eight times and being hung up on, they thought they hung up this time and didn't. The lady that is supposed to be answering phones is cussing up a storm in the …More

name: Erin Jones
text: Just tried this pizza for the first time and it was really good! The mac and cheese is wonderful! We had it delivered and it was here fast than predicted! Very yummy!

name: Jana Gonzales
text: The pizza is wonderful and the staff are very polite and courteous, very fast and good price for what you get! We need Toppers Pizza here in Ft. Collins

name: mandy hoffer
text: TBH I dont even like pizza but the nacho pizza substitute pepper jack instead of mozzarella is heaven on a plate!

name: B B
text: Love the variety of toppings here! Any kind of pizza I could fathom is available here! And they are one of the few places in town that are open late. Great prices too!

name: Eric Vender
text: order a couple pizzas today and Megan was super helpful with placing my order. She was also laughing and made me feel very comfortable. Its nice to receive great customer service.  Thank you Megan.

name: Zachary Jensen
text: There use to be one right by my house in fort Collins but they closed so every so often I drive to loveland just cause it's that good of a pizza place... thank you all

name: Liddy Mac77
text: The varieties of pizza here is off the chain!..They usually have good deals..Staff is pretty cool!

name: Meowow Nya
text: I ordered a hand tossed pizza and I got a flat crusted pizza that tasted... Not the best. I feel like I wasted my money a little... I've never had that happen before and I hope it doesn't happen again.

name: Eric Arvola
text: I have had only one pizza from here but it was good.  I would go back for a second one.  The young man at the counter was nice.

name: Krystalyn Lockard
text: We ordered from the Loveland location and the Pizza was excellent!!! Lots of choices for toppings and sauces. We had a mishap with our order, not sure if it was us or the computer but it didn't matter whose fault it was. They went above and …More

name: Peyton Badberg
text: Amazing one of the best places for pizza in loveland!

name: Ryan Hentges
text: I was the first in line at this Toppers when they had the grand opening. The pizza/topperstix are great and the employees were all very friendly and accommodating. Although the prices may be a little high, it's convenience we pay for, and …More

name: Mike Dodge
text: Not sure how their pizza tastes, as both times we tried to order, gave up as couldn't get through on phone. Got hung up twice the first time, and once the second. I think we'll stay with Arte.

name: Riley Osborn
text: They give themselves much more credit than they deserve. I had buffalo chicken pizza and it tasted nothing like buffalo chicken. You can’t even tast the cheese, it’s so bad. The crust is flavorless and bland. This place isn’t worthy of taking my money for the expensive stuff they sell, worse than buffet pizza.

name: Bryan Johnson
text: Great place for lunch! Counter guy was fun to joke with and pizza was yum!

name: Allie Sapp
text: I’m surprised to see all the one star reviews this place got!!! I got a flyer on my door from toppers and it looked amazing so I decided to give it a shot. Just ordered the totza pizza and some cheese sticks and it arrived looking EXACTLY …More

name: Betsy Kufalk
text: Very good meal love pizza with garlic butter. Not all have garlic butter.

name: Liana Ault
text: Very nice people work there.

name: Harpoon
text: Great food try the Mac and cheese that’s a killer

name: Harley Hinnegan
text: I love this place, but man, if you guys don't get the Bacon Honey Mustard sauce back in the Loveland store soon I just might rage lol. You can't addict me to something like that and then just take it away. Halp! Edit: Nah, sorry. Your guys' …More

name: Jason Moyer
text:
I went for the first time and there was a mistake while ordering and when I brought it up the staff was understanding and helped solve the problem immediately
Will come back again

name: Brian Brakke
text: Great pizza, wings, bread. Friendly staff.. 2 thumbs up!

name: Dayne Rhoades
text: Quality and price do not match. Domino's is better in comparison and cost like a third of the price for the same size. Do yourself a favor and save your money.

name: Ryan Enriquez
text: Tasty pizza finally in Loveland! Try the tall boy I recommend it. The management was great to deal with on a minor mix up on my delivery. Will be back!

name: Jason McCarthy
text: Best pizza! The loaded Totza with chicken!

name: Sara Sandoval
text: It's just not very good pizza.  It is highly priced for a low quality meal.  We wanted to try it but will stick to Pizza Street.

name: Madison Phillips
text: Awesome pizza, a lot of different choices and very affordable! The staff is awesome and super nice as well

name: Brently Goff
text: Pizza wasn't great but was decent for cheap and fast

name: Trey Clark
text: So this is the first time i got an order from toppers. I saw that the crust was vegan so i decided to make 2 pizzas (one vegan friendly) the bbq chicken we got tasted good but there wasnt that much on the pizza. The vegan friendly one i …More

name: Garrett Molstad
text: It was alright but not great, you guys definitely need to work on the taste. I got a pizza with bacon, pepperoni and mushrooms (The mushrooms took the whole pizza over in a bad way). Worry less about the look of the box and worry more about …More

name: Jacquelyn Ambrose
text: Not impressed by anymeans.... very $$$$ and not worth the taste or size. There is one table inside if you wanted to eat there and no soda machine. You're lucky if you can find the napkins tucked behind the register.  Only sodas to purchase. …More

name: Brad Bronze
text: Worst pizza ever! I ordered 2 pizzas with extra sauce and there was maybe a tablespoon of sauce on the whole thing. They cheap out on the toppings using barely enough to see. Overpriced and worse than a 7/11 pizza. I paid 50 dollars for 2 …More

name: Rose Hayden
text: I got pizza and some stix, and both were astonishingly tasty. If you love bacon, mac'n'cheese, or any number of unusual toppings, this is the place to go! And they're open late, which is nice in a town where the sidewalks tend to be rolled up at 9pm.

name: Angelo Davis
text: Very expensive for the quality in which you are getting. Average tasting pizza, although the crust has good chew. Probably won't be coming back anytime soon.

name: Daniel Odorizzi
text: Waited almost 2 hours for cold pizza and wings. After heating it up some not bad prob best to get takeout instead.

name: Rusty Gruppo
text: My wife and I wanted to try the new pizza place in town , sorry we did. She ordered the pizza and I asked her how much it was , she said it was $21 for a 14-inch Pizza. That's absolutely ridiculous for a 14-inch Pizza I said. She said we …More

name: Cliff Labrec
text: They forgot to put the ranch drizzle on the totza, also my ranch dipping sauce. All in all not terrible but kinda expensive for what you get. delivery time was good. Juat about 30 mins

name: Markus Neuwirther
text: MAKE SURE YOU CHECK YOUR BANK ACCOUNT AFTER ORDERING FROM HERE!!! We gave the driver a $5 cash tip then noticed on our bank account that they debited $5 more than they should have. I called and spoke with a manager who told me that the …More

name: Darcey Gunn
text: Way to expensive for what you get.  The pizza was not very good. We ordered the cheese sticks and cinnamon sticks and those were very good. Not good enough for me to try this place again how ever.

name: Max Otto
text: The bacon cheeseburger pizza is amazing. Add extra mozzarella and jalapeño!

name: Brenda Smith
text: Love the raspberry monkey bread!

name: Mellisa Muniz
text: First time ordering from toppers pizza . Have to say it was amazing.  The pizza isn't greasy  like most other places and the staff is very nice . Fast delivery    Definitely  will come back !

name: John Kleiber
text: Toppers Pizza introduced themselves to our school, and shared some pizza's with our staff. The Buffalo pizza was delicious. Nice people, good pizza 'nuff said!

name: Noah Young
text: I want to say this was my second time ordering from topper's and the pizza was great and the delivery guy was really nice and the pizza is the best and I will come back and order from them again.

name: Courtney Bensing
text: I LOVE pizza, but I've tried toppers twice and I think it's honestly pretty gross. I hate the sauce, its like stewed grape tomatoes- blech! Also the garlic parmesan wings- gross. They smell and taste like they're covered in Italian …More

name: Lonnie Brown
text: Love this place by far the best service and pizza joint in Fort Collins/ Loveland I've been too

name: Andy Herrera
text: They have good coupons, and so many options of toppings and sauces! Its awesome.

name: Ryan Andersen
text: Great pizza, glad they are in NOCO!

name: J Bicycle
text:
Strike 4!
We have been customers since this place opened, and it used to be awesome. It quickly became our go to pizza place in town. That has changed. …More

name: Rod Davis
text: Just tried Toppers pizza today and gotta say was some of the best pizza ever. It was not greasy and the cheese was over the top.

name: Kyle Dalton
text: Helpful friendly staff and the Buffalo chicken mac n cheese pizza is bomb!

name: Michael Farace
text: Perfect food. Amazing service. Best pizza in loveland.

name: spencer lawrence
text: I went on opening day. I was customer 53 so no free pizza for me sadly. But thats okay! I got the large mac and cheese pizza (it was to die for), the BBQ wings (so tender and the ranch was perfection), and the cinimon toppersticks (the …More

name: Judy Valdez Pensado
text: Ordered my cousin a pizza from across state and asked them to write a get better note inside because she was feeling down and they made her night # Thanks so much for caring for your customers

name: Neil Wilson
text: As the 45th customer in line not getting my certificate is not ok. Watching people walk walk off with 2 or 3 in their hand not ok.  Employees of family members getting them also not ok.  Not even gonna bother with the food aspect.  If give u a 0 rating if possible!

name: britt nicole
text: Made a order online was emailed it would be delivered at 12:08 was delivered 30 mins late i called the store too see where my pizza was and the lady who answered Was very rude the pizza wasn't warm will never order from here again! I ordered this for a business lunch I am very disappointed with this company.

name: Chad Knasinski
text: Toppers-stix are the best!  Love them!!

name: Matthew
text: The last few times just okay.

name: Tammy Hamilton
text: The Best pizza I have tasted! Friendly people!

name: GeriLynnElizabeth Dent-Stebnitz
text: Love, Love, Love their pizza, sweets.fooooooooood🐞🌺

name: Marci Green
text: The worst pizza ever! I would rather have had a grocery store pizza. Way over priced!!

name: Kelly5 Smithb
text: We did not receive great customer service....

name: Devon DeJong
text: Best pizza in town.

name: Shawna Hirter
text: Ah-mazing!

text: Love the bread

name: Denise Gagne
text: The bacon cheese bread sticks.... Oh My!!!

name: Jen Marchus
text: I have never in my life paid this much for pizza. Not worth it!

name: Alan McBride
text: I love it!

name: Gary V.
text: Not your usual pizza place

name: Eric Elwell
text: I wasn't there

name: Purple McSkol
text: Told we were out of delivery area, just mapped it...3.2 miles way...Wow!

text: Fire!

text: Midnight munchies got you... This place is open til 3 and the food is fire

text: Where are the toppings??¿???¿ No matter what you order it is a cheese pizza.
